name: Cafezim Simulator
description:
From the same developer that brought you the relaxing Watch Paint Dry - Fence Edition -, comes another amazing simulation to bring joy for your everyday life in the 2020 quarantine.

Now you can experience the pleasure of enjoying a nice cup of coffee while having no need to drink it yourself!

This truly innovating piece of software lets you fully customize your computer screen, keyboard and coffee mug as your hearth desires!*

Of course the game if free! You can pay me a coffee if you want too, but I would rather download it first if I were you.

So, what are you waiting for? Come experience this warmth game right now! "What I am doing with my life..." - Martin Marques, 2020

The Entire Game by @m3ny0

*There are limited customizations for you to choose from, if you feel like none of them represent your current heart desire, please contact me.
